title: Nine arrested in France over death of far-right student
summary_full: Quentin Deranque died on Saturday, two days after being beaten in Lyon by masked men believed to be far-left militants.
summary_public: Quentin Deranque died on Saturday, two days after being beaten in Lyon by masked men believed to be far-left militants.
